00006 static long heapsize()
00007 {
00008 
00009     long total = farcoreleft();
00010     struct farheapinfo heap;
00011     char heapStr[50];
00012         strcpy(heapStr,"Current heap Status :");
00013 //    ostrstream totalStr( heapStr, sizeof heapStr);
00014 
00015     switch( farheapcheck() )
00016         {
00017         case _HEAPEMPTY:
00018             strcat(heapStr, "     No heap");
00019             total = -1;
00020             break;
00021 
00022         case _HEAPCORRUPT:
00023             strcat(heapStr, "Heap corrupt");
00024             total = -2;
00025             break;
00026 
00027         case _HEAPOK:
00028                 strcat(heapStr, "Heap OK");
00029             heap.ptr = NULL;
00030             while(farheapwalk(&heap) != _HEAPEND)
00031                 if(!heap.in_use)
00032                     total += heap.size;
00033   //        totalStr << setw(12) << total << ends;
00034   
00035             break;
00036         }
00037 
00038 
00039 //cout<<total;
00040     return(total);
00041 }
